exm.cur: 牡丹虽好，终须绿叶扶持
exm.trd: 牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持
exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , zhōng xū lǜ yè fú chí

exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán zhàng lǜ yè fú chí
